official_title: A Pre-emptive Prevention Bundle for Patients at High Risk for Hospital-onset Clostridioides Difficile
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients admitted to ICU or Oncology units and identified to carry C. Difficile via VRE swab
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients not identified as carriers of C. difficile and patients not admitted to ICU or oncology units
